Source code for fastai.torch_imports

import os
import torch, torchvision, torchtext
from torch import nn, cuda, backends, FloatTensor, LongTensor, optim
import torch.nn.functional as F
from torch.autograd import Variable
from torch.utils.data import Dataset, TensorDataset
from torch.nn.init import kaiming_uniform, kaiming_normal
from torchvision.transforms import Compose
from torchvision.models import resnet18, resnet34, resnet50, resnet101, resnet152
from torchvision.models import vgg16_bn, vgg19_bn
from torchvision.models import densenet121, densenet161, densenet169, densenet201

from .models.resnext_50_32x4d import resnext_50_32x4d
from .models.resnext_101_32x4d import resnext_101_32x4d
from .models.resnext_101_64x4d import resnext_101_64x4d
from .models.wrn_50_2f import wrn_50_2f
from .models.inceptionresnetv2 import InceptionResnetV2
from .models.inceptionv4 import InceptionV4
from .models.nasnet import nasnetalarge

import warnings
warnings.filterwarnings('ignore', message='Implicit dimension choice',
                        category=UserWarning, module='.*container.*')


[docs]def children(m): return m if isinstance(m, (list, tuple)) else list(m.children())


[docs]def save_model(m, p): torch.save(m.state_dict(), p)

def load_model(m, p): m.load_state_dict(torch.load(p))

[docs]def load_model(m, p): m.load_state_dict(torch.load(p, map_location=lambda storage, loc: storage))



[docs]def load_pre(pre, f, fn):
    m = f()
    path = os.path.dirname(__file__)
    if pre: load_model(m, f'{path}/weights/{fn}.pth')
    return m



[docs]def inception_4(pre):
    return children(load_pre(pre, InceptionV4, 'inceptionv4-97ef9c30'))[0]


[docs]def inceptionresnet_2(pre): return load_pre(pre, InceptionResnetV2, 'inceptionresnetv2-d579a627')


[docs]def resnext50(pre): return load_pre(pre, resnext_50_32x4d, 'resnext_50_32x4d')


[docs]def resnext101(pre): return load_pre(pre, resnext_101_32x4d, 'resnext_101_32x4d')


[docs]def resnext101_64(pre): return load_pre(pre, resnext_101_64x4d, 'resnext_101_64x4d')


[docs]def wrn(pre): return load_pre(pre, wrn_50_2f, 'wrn_50_2f')


[docs]def dn121(pre): return children(densenet121(pre))[0]


[docs]def dn161(pre): return children(densenet161(pre))[0]


[docs]def dn169(pre): return children(densenet169(pre))[0]


[docs]def dn201(pre): return children(densenet201(pre))[0]


[docs]def vgg16(pre): return children(vgg16_bn(pre))[0]


[docs]def vgg19(pre): return children(vgg19_bn(pre))[0]
